title: Corner shops and Russian ballet
itunes:title: Corner shops and Russian ballet
itunes:subtitle: Babita Sharma talks about her new BBC Four documentary 'Booze, Beans and Bhajis: The Story of the Corner Shop', while Simon Morrison explores the colourful history of the Bolshoi Ballet.  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and op...
description:
Babita Sharma talks about her new BBC Four documentary 'Booze, Beans and Bhajis: The Story of the Corner Shop', while Simon Morrison explores the colourful history of the Bolshoi Ballet.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
